concept.title: Managing Device Settings
concept.shortdesc: Tap the Menu icon and then Settings to display the application settings. Your settings will be persisted at the server so they are maintained across installs and other mobile devices you may use.

row.entry: Set whether or not to show offline contacts in your contact list.

Set whether or not to show the photos of people in your contact list. Photos will always be shown in the active chats view, at the top of the chat screen and on the Contact Info screen. If a photo is not available a default avatar will be used.
System messages are used inform the user of onetime events such as users entering and leaving group chats. This setting is off by default. Turn it on if you wish to see them displayed.
With this setting ON, once the app has been configured it will automatically login whenever the app is started from the application icon.
Set the length of time you want to remain online when you put the app in the background.
